mapper.update: INSERT INTO cart(cart_no, user_no, pd_id, cart_count) VALUES(cart_seq.nextval, ${user_no}, ${pd_id}, ${cart_count})
mapper.select: select row_number() over(order by c.cart_no desc) as num, cart_no, c.user_no, c.pd_id, c.cart_count, c.cart_date, p.pd_name, p.pd_price from cart c inner join product p on c.pd_id = p.pd_id where c.user_no = #{user_no}
select decode(count(*), 0, '2', '1') from cart where pd_id=#{pd_id}
